benchmark_details.name: KorMedMCQA (Korean Medical Multiple-Choice Question Answering)
benchmark_details.overview: KorMedMCQA is the first Korean Medical Multiple-Choice Question Answering benchmark, derived from professional healthcare licensing examinations conducted in Korea, containing 7,469 questions across various medical disciplines.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the performance of language models in answering medical multiple-choice questions tailored for the Korean healthcare context.

data.source: Official Korean healthcare professional licensing examinations data from the Korea Health Personnel Licensing Examination Institute.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on model output comparison with correct answers.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance of language models in answering medical questions.
methodology.validation: Each questionâ€™s validity was ensured through review by medical professionals.
